name: Gleeb Glob
description: GleebGlob is a physics-based 2D precision platformer following a fatigued employee who's lost their head. Climb the corporate ladder by racing to the top through a series of challenging platforms. Run solo or race with others in competitive multiplayer matches. Collect and unleash a variety of unique power-up items to get ahead in the journey to the top. The stakes are high and so is the competition. Don't slip up! One wrong move could send you falling back to the bottom.
